statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type IN ('Credit', 'Debit') AND user_id = 202 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, details FROM transaction_logs WHERE action = 'purchase';
SELECT detection_id, fraud_type FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT log_id, details FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs JOIN fraud_detection ON transaction_logs.log_id = fraud_detection.log_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action FROM transaction_logs WHERE action LIKE '%approve%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT detection_id, fraud_type FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_logs >= 5;
SELECT log_id, details->>'amount' AS amount_details FROM transaction_logs WHERE details->>'status' = 'processed' ORDER BY amount_details DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM auditor_logs WHERE action='audit'
SELECT id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE status='approved'
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE is_fraud=true
SELECT timestamp, action FROM auditor_logs
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM auditor_logs WHERE action IN ('login', 'logout') AND user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE status = 'pending' AND account_id = 'AC123'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transaction_logs WHERE status = 'success' GROUP BY account_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT user_id, action, COUNT(*) AS num_actions FROM auditor_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_actions DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, action FROM audit_log WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 7 ORDER BY fraud_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT id, action FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, MAX(fraud_score) AS max_fraud_score FROM fraud_detection GROUP BY transaction_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_actions FROM audit_log WHERE action LIKE '%login%' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, user_id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, description FROM transaction_logs WHERE description LIKE '%transfer%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, amount, user_id FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, timestamp, user_id, amount, description FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, account_number, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT id, event_type, details FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'login' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT timestamp, user_id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, description FROM fraud_records WHERE user_id = 12345 AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
